repnme.cdata!:
Tanzania - Songo Songo Petroleum
            Exploration Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Songo-Songo Petroleum Exploration
            Project is intended to finance the first phase of a drilling
            program designed to assist the Borrower in the assessment of
            the hydrocarbon potential of the Songo-Songo field area and
            to strengthen the capability of MWEM in the energy sector.
            Specifically, the credit will finance: (a) drilling of two
            wells (one on-shore and one off-shore) at the Songo-Songo
            field area out of a required four well drilling program; (b)
            strengthening MWEM's capability in energy sector
            planning and policy formulation; and (c) strengthening
            TPDC's capacity to implement the project through the
            provision of technical assistance and training of its staff.
            If oil is found to be present in sufficient quantities to
            warrant development, the ensuing production will be
            extremely beneficial to Tanzania in reducing petroleum
            imports and associated foreign exchange costs.
